 Description:

 A new milestone in the history of vampire hunters c darkspawn and a new stage in the history of the famed series Castlevania.
 When was the end of time, the Earth was in the grip of forces of darkness and the mysterious Lords of Shadow. Countries ravaged by wandering souls of the dead are not able to find peace and mysterious creatures have sown death and destruction among the survivors.
 The player will become Gabriel - one of the knights of the Brotherhood of Light, an organization of holy warriors to protect humanity from the forces of evil. His wife fell victim to the creatures of darkness, but her soul is not found peace. Realizing that for the danger looming over the world, she took the right decision - to send Gabriel on the path to salvation of mankind.


Features Repack: 

 Castlevania: Lords of Shadow - Ultimate Edition
 Sewn Update 2
 Do not cut / recoded
 Crack text from Zone Of Games (v1.21)
 Crack sound from J-Studio (v1.0, DLC not yet announced)
